lead_paragraph: The Devils signed their leading scorer, Brian Gionta, and four other veterans yesterday after the N.H.L. gave the team $3.5 million in salary cap relief by placing the veteran forward Alexander Mogilny on the long-term injury exception list.
snippet: The Devils signed their leading scorer, Brian Gionta, and four other veterans yesterday after the N.H.L. gave the team $3.5 million in salary cap relief by placing the veteran forward Alexander Mogilny on the long-term injury exception list.
